title: A modern romantic fairy tail
review:
This Anime is what you expect from a Japanese Anime. An amazing story telling and a magical film.When you see the title of the movie at first you won't guess anything about how the story will be. A surprise in every turn of events cannot guess what is coming next.
The characters are very well presented.You are discovering the events of the story in the same time the characters are. you keep on thinking what is going to happen as characters are discovering what is going on though the story.What is also great about the movie is the Japanese songs so beautiful adds a lot to the story, the cinematography is nothing less than amazing and enchanting.Finally, it is a must watch.
